Paragraph: Moreover , the observed hole mobility is higher than those of the recent reported mainchain D-A polymers , 9 verifying that side - chain D-A polymers can have strong intermolecular orbital overlap and good molecular packing like main - chain D-A polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| side-chain D-A polymers |
| mainchain D-A polymers |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Moreover , the observed hole mobility is higher than those of the recent reported mainchain D-A polymers , 9 verifying that side - chain D-A polymers can have strong intermolecular orbital overlap and good molecular packing like main - chain D-A polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| observed hole mobility |
| those of the recent reported mainchain D-A polymers |
| higher |
| side-chain D-A polymers |
| strong intermolecular orbital overlap |
| good molecular packing |
| like main-chain D-A polymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| observed hole mobility |
| higher |
| intermolecular orbital overlap |
| molecular packing |
| of side-chain D-A polymers |
| like main-chain D-A polymers |

Note: "higher" is considered a property modifier for "observed hole mobility" and is included as part of the property name. "Of" is also included as part of the property name for "of side-chain D-A polymers" to maintain the original meaning.
